item.title: Trump’s Pledge to the Middle East: No More ‘Lectures on How to Live’
item.description: In Saudi Arabia, the president denounced Western intervention and nation-building, garnering both praise and eye rolls.

item.title: Trump Budget Cuts Hobble Antismoking Programs
item.description: The elimination of a key C.D.C. office has slashed funding to states for help lines used by thousands to stop smoking and vaping.

item.title: What Is ‘Debanking’? How the Right to a Bank Account Became Political.
item.description: There is a degree of political agreement over so-called debanking, but no easy answers to the hot topic in Washington.

item.title: The Booming Business of Returned Products
item.description: As retailers slow down orders for foreign goods because of tariffs, companies that recirculate overstocked or returned items may help fill the gap.

item.title: Earlybirds Dance Club Is for Women Who Party ’Til the Break of 10 p.m.
item.description: Earlybirds, a roving dance party that ends as most nightclubs are opening, caters to women who have things to do in the morning — and need dancing mor...
